name: PowerCenter:XML Source Qualifier Transformation Naming convention
description:
XML Source Qualifier Transformation name should begin with X. 
The prefix is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all XML Source Qualifier Transformations that does not respect the naming conventions. It provides the following information: XML Source Qualifier Transformations full name
rationale: For understandability and maintainability, naming conventions must be respected.
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
total: Total number of XML Source Qualifier Transformations
